metadata.title: CVE-2018-20458 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In radare2 prior to 3.1.1, r_bin_dyldcache_extract inlibr/bin/format/mach0/dyldcache.c may allow attackers to cause adenial-of-service (application crash caused by out-of-bounds read) bycrafting an input file.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
